DOC.detailed_description: This phase 1 , multi-center , open-label study safety , tolerability , pharmacodynamics , preliminary efficacy young ( < 30 year age ) healthy male donor plasma transfusion patient PSP . Up 10 subject receive monthly 4-unit transfusion young healthy male donor plasma 6 month . If ≥3 subject experience drug limit toxicity ( DLT ) , define Section 7.19 , study terminate . Any subject experience DLT discontinue treatment study drug . An interim futility analysis perform five subject complete 6 month study drug treatment . If criterion list Section 9.3 protocol meet , additional 5 subject enrol trial . If , trial terminate .
